articles.title: SimCity developers say 2013 launch was "heartbreaking" - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: SimCity 2013's launch was so bad it arguably killed the game, and the entire citybuilding series. Ten years later, its developers look back on what went wrong.
articles.content:
I have a soft spot for SimCity (2013). It was beautiful and it was fun, even if it was heavily compromised in its construction.
Cheery RPS fanzine PC Gamer recently spoke to some of its design team … [+2541 chars]
